body:
Google has published an extensive SketchUp API; while as far as I  
know the file format has not been published, the API is likely to  
persist, so  user-written export scripts are possible.  I haven't dug  
into it yet--I've actually been thinking about it for a while--, but  
I gather Thomas Bleicher has, and has something "almost" working.


Randolph


On Oct 24, 2007, at 8:19 AM, Greg Ward wrote:
